results.name: Expansion of (1 - x)^4/((1 - x)^6 + x^6).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..3000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (6,-15,20,-15,6,-2).
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[(-1)^k * Binomial[n+1, 6*k+1], {k, 0, Floor[n/6]}]; Array[a, 36, 0] (* _Amiram Eldar_, May 14 2021 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 24 2019
